Message.name: ATTACH ACCEPT
Message.description: This message is sent by the network to the UE to indicate that the corresponding attach request has been accepted.

Message.name: ATTACH REQUEST
Message.description: This message is sent by the UE to the network in order to perform an attach procedure

Message.name: ATTACH REJECT
Message.description: This message is sent by the network to the UE to indicate that the corresponding attach request has been rejected

Message.name: ATTACH COMPLETE
Message.description: This message is sent by the UE to the network in response to an ATTACH ACCEPT message

Message.name: AUTHENTICATION FAILURE
Message.description: This message is sent by the UE to the network to indicate that authentication of the network has failed

Message.name: AUTHENTICATION REJECT
Message.description: This message is sent by the network to the UE to indicate that the authentication procedure has failed and that the UE shall abort all activites

Message.name: AUTHENTICATION REQUEST
Message.description: This message is sent by the network to the UE to initiate authentication of the UE identity

Message.name: AUTHENTICATION RESPONSE
Message.description: This message is sent by the UE to the network to deliver a calculated authentication response to the network

Message.name: CS SERVICE NOTIFICATION
Message.description: This message is sent by the network when a paging request with CS call indicator was received via SGs for a UE, and a NAS signalling connection is already established for the UE

Message.name: DETACH ACCEPT
Message.description: This message is sent by the network to indicate that the detach procedure has been completed

Message.name: DETACH REQUEST(UE)
Message.description: This message is sent by the UE to request the release of an EMM context

Message.name: DETACH REQUEST(NW)
Message.description: This message is sent by the networ to request the release of an EMM context

Message.name: DOWNLINK NAS TRANSPORT
Message.description: This message is sent by the network to the UE in order to carry an SMS message in encapsulated format

Message.name: EMM INFORMATION
Message.description: This message is sent by the network at any time during EMM context is established to send certain information to the UE

InformationElement.name: Universal time and local time zone

Message.name: EMM STATUS
Message.description: This message is sent by the UE or by the network at any time to report certain error conditions listed in clause 7

Message.name: EXTENDED SERVICE REQUEST
Message.description: This message is sent by the UE to the network to initiate a CS fallback call or respond to a mobile terminated CS fallback request from the network

Message.name: GUTI REALLOCATION COMMAND
Message.description: This message is sent by the network to the UE to reallocate a GUTI and optionally to provide a new TAI list

Message.name: GUTI REALLOCATION COMPLETE
Message.description: This message is sent by the UE to the network to indicate that reallocation of a GUTI has taken place

Message.name: IDENTITY REQUEST
Message.description: This message is sent by the network to the UE to request the UE to provide the specified identity

Message.name: IDENTITY RESPONSE
Message.description: This message is sent by the UE to the network in response to an IDENTITY REQUEST message and provides the requested identity

Message.name: SECURITY MODE COMMAND
Message.description: This message is sent by the network to the UE to establish NAS signalling security

Message.name: SECURITY MODE COMPLETE
Message.description: This message is sent by the UE to the network in response to a SECURITY MODE COMMAND message

Message.name: SECURITY MODE REJECT
Message.description: This message is sent by the UE to the network to indicate that the corresponding security mode command has been rejected

Message.name: SERVICE REJECT
Message.description: This message is sent by the network to the UE in order to reject the service request procedure

Message.name: SERVICE REQUEST
Message.description: This message is sent by the UE to the network to request the establishment of a NAS signalling connection and of the radio and S1 bearers. Its structure does not floow the structure of standerd layer 3 message

Message.name: TRACKING AREA UPDATE ACCEPT
Message.description: This message is sent by the network to the UE to provide the UE with EPS mobility management related data in response to a tracking area update request message

Message.name: TRACKING AREA UPDATE COMPLETE
Message.description: This message shall be sent by the UE to the network inresponse to a tracking area update accept message if a GUTI has been changed or a new TMSI has been assgined

Message.name: TRACKING AREA UPDATE REJECT
Message.description: This message is sent by the network to the UE in order to reject the tracking area updating procedure.

Message.name: TRACKING AREA UPDATE REQUEST
Message.description: The purpose of sending the tracking area update request by the UE to the network are described in subclause 5.5.3.1

InformationElement.name: Non-current native NAS key set identifier
UE radio capability information update needed
InformationElement.type: UE radio capability information update needed

InformationElement.name: Voice domain preference and UE's usage setting
InformationElement.type: Voice domain preference and UE's usage setting

Message.name: UPLINK NAS TRANSPORT
Message.description: This message is sent by the UE to the network in order to carry an SMS message in encapsulated format

Message.name: DOWNLINK GENERIC NAS TRANSPORT
Message.description: This message is sent by the network to the UE in order to carry an application message in encapsulated format

Message.name: UPLINK GENERIC NAS TRANSPORT
Message.description: This message is sent by the UE to the network in order to carry an application protocol message in encapsulated format

Message.name: PDN CONNECTIVITY REQUEST
Message.description: This message is sent by the UE to the network to initiate establishment of a PDN connection

Message.name: ACTIVATE DEDICATED EPS BEARER CONTEXT ACCEPT
Message.description: Thie message is sent by the UE to the network to acknowledge activation of a dedicated EPS bearer context associated with the same PDN address and APN as an already active EPS bearer context

Message.name: ACTIVATE DEDICATED EPS BEARER CONTEXT REJECT
Message.description: This message is sent by the UE to the network to reject activation of a dedicated EPS bearer context

Message.name: ACTIVATE DEDICATED EPS BEARER CONTEXT REQUEST
Message.description: This message is sent by the network to the UE to request activation of a dedicated EPS bearer context associated with the same PDN address and APn as an already active default EPS bearer context

Message.name: ACTIVATE DEFAULT EPS BEARER CONTEXT ACCEPT
Message.description: This message is sent by the UE to the network to acknowledge activation of a default EPS bearer context.

Message.name: ACTIVATE DEFAULT EPS BEARER CONTEXT REJECT
Message.description: This message is sent by UE to the network to reject activation of a default EPS bearer context

Message.name: ACTIVATE DEFAULT EPS BEARER CONTEXT REQUEST
Message.description: This message is sent by the network to the UE to request activation of a default EPS bearer context

Message.name: BEARER RESOURCE ALLOCATION REJECT
Message.description: This message is sent by the network to the UE to reject the allocation of a dedicated bearer resource

Message.name: BEARER RESOURCE ALLOCATION REQUEST
Message.description: This message is sent by the UE to the network to request the allocation of a dedicated bearer resource

Message.name: BEARER RESOURCE MODIFICATION REJECT
Message.description: This message is sent by the network to the UE to reject the modification of a dedicated bearer resource

Message.name: BEARER RESOURCE MODIFICATION REQUEST
Message.description: This message is sent by the UE to the network to request the modification of a dedicated bearer resource

InformationElement.name: EPS bearer identity for packet fileter

Message.name: DEACTIVATE EPS BEARER CONTEXT ACCEPT
Message.description: This message is sent by the UE to acknowledge deactivation of the EPS bearer context requested in the corresponding Deactivate EPS bearer context request message

Message.name: DEACTIVATE EPS BEARER CONTEXT REQUEST
Message.description: This message is sent by the network to request deactivation of an active EPS bearer context

Message.name: ESM INFORMATION REQUEST
Message.description: This message is sent by the network to the UE to request the UE to provide ESM information

Message.name: ESM INFORMATION RESPONSE
Message.description: This message is sent by the UE to the network in response to an ESM INFORMATION REQUEST message and provides the requested ESM information

Message.name: ESM STATUS
Message.description: This message is sent by the network or the UE to pass information on the status of the indicated EPS bearer context and report certain error conditions

Message.name: MODIFY EPS BEARER CONTEXT ACCEPT
Message.description: This message is sent by the UE to the network to acknowledge the modification of an active EPS bearer context

Message.name: MODIFY EPS BEARER CONTEXT REJECT
Message.description: This message is sent by the UE or the network to reject a modification of an active EPS bearer context

Message.name: MODIFY EPS BEARER CONTEXT REQUEST
Message.description: This message is sent by the network to the UE to request modification of an active EPS bearer context

Message.name: NOTIFICATION
Message.description: This message is sent by the network to inform the UE about events which are relevant for the upper layer using an EPS bearer context or having requested a procedure transaction

Message.name: PDN CONNECTIVITY REJECT
Message.description: This message is sent by the network to the UE to reject establishment of a PDN connection

Message.name: PDN DISCONNECT REJECT
Message.description: This message is sent by the network to the UE to reject release of a PDN connection

Message.name: PDN DISCONNECT REQUEST
Message.description: This message is sent by the UE to the network to initiate release of a PDN connection

Message.name: DLINFORMATIONTRANSFER
Message.description: This message is used for the downlink transfer of dedicated NAS information

Message.name: MEASUREMENTREPORT
Message.description: This message is used for the indication of measurement results

Message.name: PAGING
Message.description: This message is used for the notification of one or more UEs

Message.name: RRCCONNECTIONRECONFIGURATION
Message.description: This message is the command to modify an RRC connection. It may convey information for measurement configuration, mobility control, radio resource configuration (including RBs, MAC main configuration and physical channel configuration) including any associated dedicated NAS information and security configuration

Message.name: RRCCONNECTIONRECONFIGURATIONCOMPLETE
Message.description: This message is used to confirm the successful completion of an RRC connection reconfiguration

Message.name: RRCCONNECTIONREESTABLISHMENT
Message.description: This message is used to resolve contention and to re-establish SRB 1

Message.name: RRCCONNECTIONREESTABLISHMENTCOMPLETE
Message.description: This message is used to confirm the successful completion of an RRC connection reestablishment

Message.name: RRCCONNECTIONREESTABLISHMENTREJECT
Message.description: This message is used to indicate the rejection of an RRC connection reestablishment request

Message.name: RRCCONNECTIONREESTABLISHMENTREQUEST
Message.description: This message is used to request the reestablishment of an RRC connection

Message.name: RRCCONNECTIONREJECT
Message.description: This message is used to reject the RRC connection establishment

Message.name: RRCCONNECTIONRELEASE
Message.description: This message is used to command the release of an RRC connection

Message.name: RRCCONNECTIONREQUEST
Message.description: This message is used to request the establishment of an RRC connection

Message.name: RRCCONNECTIONSETUP
Message.description: This message is used to establish SRB1

Message.name: RRCCONNECTIONSETUPCOMPLETE
Message.description: This message is used to confirm the successful completion of an RRC connection establishment

Message.name: SECURITYMODECOMMAND
Message.description: This message is used to command the activation of AS security

Message.name: SECURITYMODECOMPLETE
Message.description: This message is used to confirm the successful completion of a security mode command

Message.name: SECURITYMODEFAILURE
Message.description: This message is used to indicate an unsuccessful completion of a security mode command

Message.name: ULINFORMATIONTRANSFER
Message.description: This message is used for uplink transfer of dedicated NAS information

Message.name: UECAPABILITYENQUIRY
Message.description: This message is used to request the transfer of UE radio access capabilities for E-UTRAN as well as for other RATs

Message.name: UECAPABILITYINFORMATION
Message.description: This message is used to transfer of UE radio access capabilities requested by the E-UTRAN
